resources.string:
There are two different game types. \ Timed: In this game type you must click the correct square before it disappears. \ The number of misses you make is tallied up and at the end of the round your score bonus is calculated \ from the amount of correct hits and misses that you make.\
FLTL: Stands for Five lives to live. In this game mode you are allowed 5 misses of the squares,\ once you reach this limit the game is over.
